DataSourcePortable.Name: Indicadores materiais - Gr√°fico CMV
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT SUM(A.VALORCMV) VALORCMV,
 (CASE 
 WHEN SUM(A.VALORTOTALVENDAS) = 0 THEN 0
 WHEN SUM(A.VALORTOTALVENDAS) > 0 THEN ((SUM(A.VALORCMV)/SUM(A.VALORTOTALVENDAS))*100)
 END) PERCENTUALCMV,
 (CASE 
 WHEN @DATAPARTE(MES, A.COMPETENCIA) = 1 THEN 'Jan'
 WHEN @DATAPARTE(MES, A.COMPETENCIA) = 2 THEN 'Fev'
 WHEN @DATAPARTE(MES, A.COMPETENCIA) = 3 THEN 'Mar'
 WHEN @DATAPARTE(MES, A.COMPETENCIA) = 4 THEN 'Abr'
 WHEN @DATAPARTE(MES, A.COMPETENCIA) = 5 THEN 'Mai'
 WHEN @DATAPARTE(MES, A.COMPETENCIA) = 6 THEN 'Jun'
 WHEN @DATAPARTE(MES, A.COMPETENCIA) = 7 THEN 'Jul'
 WHEN @DATAPARTE(MES, A.COMPETENCIA) = 8 THEN 'Ago'
 WHEN @DATAPARTE(MES, A.COMPETENCIA) = 9 THEN 'Set'
 WHEN @DATAPARTE(MES, A.COMPETENCIA) = 10 THEN 'Out'
 WHEN @DATAPARTE(MES, A.COMPETENCIA) = 11 THEN 'Nov'
 WHEN @DATAPARTE(MES, A.COMPETENCIA) = 12 THEN 'Dez'
 END) LEGENDA
FROM PD_DWINDICADORCMV A
JOIN PD_DWINDICADORES ON PD_DWINDICADORES.HANDLE = A.DWINDICADOR 
 WHERE @CRITERIOSELECAO
 GROUP BY A.COMPETENCIA
 ORDER BY A.COMPETENCIA" /> <Fields> <DecimalField Alias="VALORCMV" From="A" Path="VALORCMV" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <DecimalField Alias="PERCENTUALCMV" From="A" Path="PERCENTUALCMV" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <Field Alias="LEGENDA" From="A" Path="LEGENDA" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
